principles.principle1: Companies cannot access genetic data held by other partner companies
principles.principle2: GENXT does not process, transmit or store any genetic or personal information
principles.principle3: Companies establish their own policies for collaboration with their chosen partners
principles.principle4: Identified matches contain only the personal information that individuals agreed to disclose
principles.principle5: Companies themselves deliver matches to their customer accounts
